description:
The zone information documentation page (http://nova.openstack.org/devref/zone.html) contains two incorrect spellings of flag names:

"zone-name" should be "zone_name"
"zone-capabilities" should be "zone_capabilities"
title: Documentation typos

comments.content:
The zone information documentation page (http://nova.openstack.org/devref/zone.html) contains two incorrect spellings of flag names:

"zone-name" should be "zone_name"
"zone-capabilities" should be "zone_capabilities"
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ed-leafe
